overview:
John Roark owns www.Knoxville.Fm and www.GoodMorning.am

The legal name of the business is www.Knoxville.Fm

John Roark is creating movies for sale and rent on the internet. These are G rated movies and the initial ones are for kids. John and his wife and 7 daughters live in Tennessee on the same land with 3 houses. Their movies are soon to be released on amazon.com.

www.Knoxville.Fm is searching for sponsors for upcoming movies.

www.Knoxville.Fm also does a very affordable business postcard campaign that is listed on www.GoodMorning.am
